All Classes

  • Class Description
    Adaptive_All
    Demo plugin making available a selection of adaptive thresholders.
    Adaptive_Bernsen
    Demo plugin showing the use of the BernsenThresholder class.
    Adaptive_Interpolating
    Demo plugin showing the use of the InterpolatingThresholder class.
    Adaptive_Niblack
    Demo plugin showing the use of the NiblackThresholder class.
    Adaptive_Sauvola
    Demo plugin showing the use of the SauvolaThresholder class.
    AxisAligned_Bounding_Box_Demo
    This plugin creates a binary region segmentation, calculates the center and major axis and subsequently the major axis-aligned bounding box for each region.
    Bilateral_Filter
    This plugin demonstrates the use of the (full) BilateralFilter class.
    Bin_Morphology_Disk
    This plugin implements a binary morphology filter using a disk-shaped structuring element whose radius can be specified.
    Bin_Morphology_Free
    This plugin implements a binary morphology filter using an arbitrary structuring element that can be interactively specified by the user.
    Brighten_Index_Image  
    Brighten_Rgb_1  
    Brighten_Rgb_2  
    Canny_Edges
    This ImageJ plugin shows the use of the Canny edge detector in its simplest form.
    Chamfer_Matching_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the ChamferMatcher class.
    Circle_Fit_Algebraic  
    Circle_Fit_Algebraic_Image  
    Circle_Fitting_Roi_Demo
    Performs algebraic ellipse fitting on the current ROI to find an initial ellipse, followed by geometric fitting.
    Circle_Sample_To_Image
    Samples points on a perfect circle and creates a new 8-bit image with foreground points (value 255) of the sample points.
    Circle_Sample_To_Image.Parameters  
    Circle_Sample_To_Roi
    Samples points on a given (ideal) circle and creates a new image with the sample points contained in a PointRoi.
    Circle_Sample_To_Roi.Parameters  
    Color_Edges_Canny
    This plugin implements the Canny edge detector for all types of images.
    Color_Edges_DiZenzo
    This plugin implements a multi-gradient (DiZenzo/Cumani-style) color edge detector.
    Color_Edges_Gray
    TThis is a simple grayscale edge detector for RGB color images.
    Color_Edges_Mono
    This is a simple color edge detector based on monochromatic techniques.
    Compute_Histogram  
    Convert_Rgb_To_Gray
    This ImageJ plugin converts an RGB color image to a grayscale image using a specific set of component weights for caclulating the luminance (luma) values.
    Convex_Hull_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the ConvexHull class.
    CorrelCoeff_Matching_Demo
    Template matching plugin based on the local correlation coefficient.
    Count_Colors  
    Custom_Generic_Filter_Scalar
    This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a 3x3 custom generic filter based on class GenericFilterScalar.
    Custom_Generic_Filter_Vector
    This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a 3x3 custom generic vector filter based on class GenericFilterVector.
    DCT_2D_Demo
    Calculates and displays the 2-dimensional DCT after converting the input image to a float image.
    Desaturate_Rgb  
    DFT_2D_Double_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin computes the 2-dimensional (power-spectrum) DFT on an image of arbitrary size using double arrays.
    DFT_2D_Float_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin computes the 2-dimensional DFT (magnitude spectrum) from an image of arbitrary size using float arrays.
    Dilate_Disk_Demo
    This plugin implements a binary dilation using a disk-shaped structuring element with a fixed radius.
    Draw_Test_Grid
    This ImageJ plugin draws a test grid in a newly created image.
    Ellipse_Closest_Points
    This plugin creates an ellipse and a set of random points.
    Ellipse_Closest_Points.ClosestPointAlgorithm  
    Ellipse_Fitting_Roi_Demo
    Performs algebraic ellipse fitting on the current ROI to find an initial ellipse, followed by geometric fitting.
    Ellipse_Sample_To_Roi
    Samples points on a given (ideal) circle and creates a new image with the sample points contained in a PointRoi.
    Ellipse_Sample_To_Roi.Parameters  
    Equalize_Histogram  
    Example_Fit_Rotated_Points  
    Extract_Sift_Features
    This plugin extracts multi-scale SIFT features from the current image and displays them as M-shaped markers.
    Filter_Arbitrary
    A hand-crafted linear filter for demo purposes only.
    Filter_Box_3x3  
    Filter_Demo_A  
    Filter_Demo_B  
    Filter_Median
    A hand-crafted median filter for 8-bit grayscale images.
    Filter_Smooth_3x3  
    Find_Corners
    This plugin demonstrates the use of gradient corner detectors.
    Gamma_Correction  
    Gaussian_Filter
    This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a generic linear filter using the classes LinearFilter and Kernel2D.
    Gaussian_Filter_Color
    This plugin performs a Gaussian filter in a user-selectable color space.
    Gaussian_Filter_Separable
    This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a generic linear filter based on classes LinearFilter and Kernel2D.
    Geometry_Rotate_Color
    This plugin rotates the input image.
    Get_Polygon_Roi_Points
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the extraction of vertex points from a user-selected polygon ROI (region of interest).
    Global_All
    Demo plugin making available a selection of global thresholders.
    Global_Isodata
    Demo plugin showing the use of the IsodataThresholder class.
    Global_MaxEntropy
    Demo plugin showing the use of the MaxEntropyThresholder class.
    Global_Mean
    Demo plugin showing the use of the MeanThresholder class.
    Global_Median
    Demo plugin showing the use of the MedianThresholder class.
    Global_MinError
    Demo plugin showing the use of the MinErrorThresholder class.
    Global_MinMax
    Demo plugin showing the use of the MinMaxThresholder class.
    Global_Otsu
    Demo plugin showing the use of the OtsuThresholder class.
    Global_Quantile
    Demo plugin showing the use of the QuantileThresholder class.
    Hough_Lines_Demo
    Hough line detection demo.
    Hough_Lines_Detect
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the HoughTransformLines class for detecting straight lines in images.
    Hough_Lines_Minimal
    This plugin implements a simple Hough transform for straight lines.
    Hsv_Filter
    This ImageJ plugin implements a Gaussian blur filter to the periodic hue component in HSV space.
    Hsv_Filter_With_SaturationWeight
    This ImageJ plugin implements a Gaussian blur filter to the periodic hue component in HSV space.
    Hsv_Show_Hue_Only
    Accepts an RGB image and shows only its hue distribution, using constant saturation and value.
    Hsv_Test  
    ICC_Profile_From_File
    This plugin lists a user-selected ICC profile file to the console.
    ICC_Profile_From_JAR
    This plugin lists the contents of a user-selected ICC profile that is retrieved from a Java resource.
    ImageAccessor_Demo_Scalar
    This plugin demonstrates the of class ScalarAccessor for unified access to scalar-valued images.
    ImageAccessor_Demo_Vector
    This plugin demonstrates the of class ImageAccessor for unified access to scalar and vector-valued images.
    Index_To_Rgb  
    Integral_Image_GetRoiStatistics
    This ImageJ plugin first calculates the integral image for the current image (8 bit grayscale only) and uses it to find the mean and variance inside the specified rectangle (ROI).
    Integral_Image_Test
    This ImageJ plugin calculates the integral image for the current image (8 bit grayscale only) and displays the resulting first and second order summed area tables.
    Interpolation_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of various pixel interpolation methods and out-of-bounds strategies.
    Interpolator_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of various pixel interpolation methods and out-of-bounds strategies.
    Jitter_Filter_GenericFilter
    Implementation of the "Jitter filter" based on the GenericFilter class.
    Jitter_Filter_ImageAccessor
    Jitter filter implemented with ImageAccessor for transparent image access.
    Jitter_Filter_Simple
    Simple version of the Jitter filter.
    Kuwahara_Filter
    Scalar version.
    Line_Fitting_Roi_Demo
    Performs line fitting on the point set specified by the current ROI.
    Line_Sample_To_Roi
    Samples points on a given (ideal) line and creates a new image with the sample points contained in a PointRoi.
    Line_Sample_To_Roi.Parameters  
    Linear_Blending
    This plugin demonstrates alpha blending between two images: imBG: the background image (passed to and modified by the run method), imFG: the foreground image (selected in a user dialog).
    Linear_Filter_3x3
    This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a generic linear filter using the classes LinearFilter and Kernel2D.
    Linear_Filter_3x3_Separable
    This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a separable linear filter using the classes LinearFilterSeparable and GenericFilter.
    LucasKanade_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin is a minimalistic example of using the Lucas-Kanade matchers.
    Major_Axis_Demo
    Shows each region's major axis as a vector scaled by the region's eccentricity.
    Make_Index_Transparent
    Makes a specific color of the current (index) color image transparent.
    Make_Projections
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the calculation of horizontal and vertical projections on a grayscale image.
    Make_Uniform_Noise
    Fills the active image with uniform noise.
    Map_Affine_Matrix
    ImageJ plugin for configurable affine image transformation.
    Map_Affine_Triangles
    Demo plugin showing how to specify an affine transformation from a pair of triangles (point arrays).
    Map_Bilinear
    Demo plugin showing how to specify a bilinear transformation from a pair of quadrilaterals (point arrays).
    Map_Projective
    This plugin demonstrates the use of geometric mappings, as implemented in the imagingbook library.
    Map_Ripple  
    Map_Rotate  
    Map_Spherical  
    Map_Translate  
    Map_Twirl  
    Match_To_Gaussian_Histogram
    Adapts image intensities to match a Gaussian histogram.
    Match_To_Image_Histogram
    Adapts image intensities to match the histogram of another image.
    Match_To_Piecewise_Linear_Histogram
    Adapts image intensities to match a piecewise-linear histogram.
    MedianFilter_Color_Scalar
    This plugin applies a scalar median filter to all three planes of a RGB color image.
    MedianFilter_Color_Vector
    This plugin applies a vector median filter to a RGB color image.
    MedianFilter_Color_VectorSharpen
    This plugin applies a sharpening vector median filter to a RGB color image.
    MSER_Detect
    Runs MSER detection on the current image and produces a color image with vector overlay.
    Nagao_Matsuyama_Filter
    This plugin demonstrates the 5x5 Nagao-Matsuyama filter, as described in NagaoMatsuyama (1979).
    Open_Test_Image
    Select and open a local RANSAC-related test image.
    Outline_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates morphological outline calculation on binary images.
    Perona_Malik_Demo
    Minimal plugin to demonstrate the use of the PeronaMalikFilter class.
    Perona_Malik_Filter
    This plugin demonstrates the use of the PeronaMalikFilter class.
    Raise_Contrast  
    Raise_Contrast_Fast
    Does the same as Raise_Contrast but uses the one-dimensional pixel array to read and writes pixel values.
    Random_Color_Demo
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of RandomHueGenerator.
    Ransac_Circles_Demo
    RANSAC circle detection demo.
    Ransac_Circles_Detect
    RANSAC circle detection implemented with imagingbook library class RansacDetectorCircle.
    Ransac_Ellipse_Demo
    RANSAC ellipse detection demo.
    Ransac_Ellipse_Detect
    RANSAC ellipse detection implemented with imagingbook library class RansacDetectorCircle.
    Ransac_Line_Demo
    RANSAC line detection demo.
    Ransac_Line_Detect
    RANSAC line detection using imagingbook library class RansacDetectorLine.
    Region_Contours_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the class RegionContourSegmentation to perform both region labeling and contour tracing simultaneously.
    Region_Eccentricity_Ellipse_Demo
    Performs binary region segmentation, then displays each region's major axis (scaled by eccentricity) and equivalent ellipse as a vector overlay.
    Region_Segmentation_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the region labeling classes in the imagingbook's "regions" package:
    Show_ComponentTree_Stack
    Creates the component tree of the current image (choose from 2 different methods) and reconstructs the associated threshold stack.
    Show_Distance_Map
    Demonstrates the use of the DistanceTransform class.
    Show_DogScaleSpace
    Builds a hierarchical Difference-of-Gaussian scale space representation from the input image and displays all scale levels.
    Show_GaussianScaleSpace
    Builds a hierarchical Gaussian scale space representation from the input image and displays all scale levels.
    Show_Histogram  
    Show_Lookup_Table  
    Show_Threshold_Projection
    Select a horizontal line! TODO: add JavaDoc
    Show_Threshold_Stack  
    Sift_Matching_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the SIFT detection and matching framework.
    Sobel_Edges_Colored  
    Test_GetStatistics
    This plugin tests ImageJ's ImageStatistics class.
    Thinning_Demo
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates morphological thinning on binary images.
    Tschumperle_Deriche_Filter
    This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the Anisotropic Diffusion filter proposed by David Tschumperle in D.
    Unsharp_Masking_Filter
    This plugin implements an Unsharp Masking filter similar to Photoshop without thresholds, using a "clean" (sufficiently large) Gaussian filter.
